title: KPT contracting a 6 lane bridge connecting East & West Wharfs: Zaidi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 29 (APP):Minister for Maritime Affairs Ali Haider Zaidi on Monday said a big challenge for Karachi Port Trust (KPT) was the movement of cargo and traffic congestion caused by it.
He said, “after two and half years of planning/tendering etc, KPT is contracting a 6 lane bridge connecting East & West Wharfs along Native Jetty  costing Rs.2.3 billion”, he tweeted.
He said the project would be completed in 18 months.
